title: Fiora w
body:
Hey everyone just wondering what are your thoughts on if the current fiora had the old fiora's w.
I think it would be better because it doesn't root fiora and for her duelist character parrying a auto makes more sense then parrying everything in the game

replies.body:
AS A FIORA MAIN PRIOR TO HER REMAKE IT'S SAD THAT I CAN'T SEEM TO RECALL WHAT HER W WAS.

ME THINKS IT WAS INCREASED ATTACK SPEED?

> [{quoted}](name=EPIKON,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=H5aoXVQt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-09T05:00:26.377+0000)
>
> AS A FIORA MAIN PRIOR TO HER REMAKE IT'S SAD THAT I CAN'T SEEM TO RECALL WHAT HER W WAS.
> 
> ME THINKS IT WAS INCREASED ATTACK SPEED?

it would deflect one auto and return the damage

THAT IS CORRECT.

I DON'T KNOW ABOUT YOU GUYS BUT I MISS OLD FIORA.

PLAYING HER IN JUNGLE WAS SUCH A PLEASURE.

> [{quoted}](name=EPIKON,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=H5aoXVQt,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-09T05:02:41.798+0000)
>
> THAT IS CORRECT.
> 
> I DON'T KNOW ABOUT YOU GUYS BUT I MISS OLD FIORA.
> 
> PLAYING HER IN JUNGLE WAS SUCH A PLEASURE.

I miss her too, she was my favorite champion
